speaker: President.
english: President. – The next item is the report ( A6-0263/2006 ) by Mrs Miguélez Ramos, on behalf of the Committee on Fisheries, on the application of Council Regulation (EC) No 1185/2003 on the removal of fins of sharks on board vessels ( 2006/2054(INI) ).
original: President. – The next item is the report ( A6-0263/2006 ) by Mrs Miguélez Ramos, on behalf of the Committee on Fisheries, on the application of Council Regulation (EC) No 1185/2003 on the removal of fins of sharks on board vessels ( 2006/2054(INI) ).
agenda_item: Removal of fins of sharks on board vessels (debate)
